java/liquibase/dbdoc/HTMLListWriter.java

00001 package liquibase.dbdoc;
00002 
00003 import java.io.File;
00004 import java.io.FileWriter;
00005 import java.io.IOException;
00006 import java.util.SortedSet;
00007 
00008 public class HTMLListWriter {
00009     private File outputDir;
00010     private String directory;
00011     private String filename;
00012     private String title;
00013 
00014     public HTMLListWriter(String title, String filename, String subdir, File outputDir) {
00015         this.title = title;
00016         this.outputDir = outputDir;
00017         this.filename = filename;
00018         if (!outputDir.exists()) {
00019             outputDir.mkdir();
00020         }
00021         this.directory = subdir;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public void writeHTML(SortedSet objects) throws IOException {
00025         FileWriter fileWriter = new FileWriter(new File(outputDir, filename));
00026 
00027         try {
00028             fileWriter.append("<HTML>\n" + "<HEAD>\n" + "<TITLE>\n");
00029             fileWriter.append(title);
00030             fileWriter.append("\n" + "</TITLE>\n" + "<LINK REL =\"stylesheet\" TYPE=\"text/css\" HREF=\"stylesheet.css\" TITLE=\"Style\">\n" + "</HEAD>\n" + "<BODY BGCOLOR=\"white\">\n" + "<FONT size=\"+1\" CLASS=\"FrameHeadingFont\">\n" + "<B>");
00031             fileWriter.append(title);
00032             fileWriter.append("</B></FONT>\n" + "<BR>\n" + "<TABLE BORDER=\"0\" WIDTH=\"100%\" SUMMARY=\"\">" + "<TR>\n" + "<TD NOWRAP><FONT CLASS=\"FrameItemFont\">");
00033 
00034 
00035             for (Object object : objects) {
00036                 fileWriter.append("<A HREF=\"");
00037                 fileWriter.append(directory);
00038                 fileWriter.append("/");
00039                 fileWriter.append(object.toString().toLowerCase());
00040                 fileWriter.append(getTargetExtension());
00041                 fileWriter.append("\" target=\"objectFrame\">");
00042                 fileWriter.append(object.toString());
00043                 fileWriter.append("</A><BR>\n");
00044             }
00045 
00046             fileWriter.append("</FONT></TD>\n" +
00047                     "</TR>\n" +
00048                     "</TABLE>\n" +
00049                     "\n" +
00050                     "</BODY>\n" +
00051                     "</HTML>");
00052         } finally {
00053             fileWriter.close();
00054         }
00055     }
00056 
00057     public String getTargetExtension() {
00058         return ".html";
00059     }
00060 }
